Featuring organization models from Tiago Forte's Building a Second Brain and an alternative research Model from Roamresearch
Cover from Jason Leung on Unsplash
One Sentence Summary
ðŸ’¡
Read about the PARA system and Building a Second Brain from Tiago Forte
Trustworthy Experts
Tiago Forte
Building a Second Brain Expert Tiago Forte has created a framework for organization that works no matter what your use case is.
Building a Second Brain: Capture, Organize, and Retrieve Your Ideas Using Digital Notes
Your contribution matters. The world is waiting for your ideas and your thinking to make the difference that only you can make.
https://www.buildingasecondbrain.com/
Tiago Forte
Official YouTube channel of Forte Labs, a productivity consultancy and training firm based in San Francisco.
https://www.youtube.com/user/simulacrumsquared/videos
Blogs
This Blog post explains the basis of his philosophy, adn exactly how you can organize all your digital information
The PARA Method: A Universal System for Organizing Digital Information
Imagine for a moment the perfect organizational system. One that supported and enhanced the work you do, telling you exactly where to put a piece of information, and exactly where to find it when you needed it. This system would have to be: universal, encompassing any conceivable kind of information from any source flexible, able...
https://praxis.fortelabs.co/the-p-a-r-a-method-a-universal-system-for-organizing-digital-information-75a9da8bfb37/
Praxis
A Members-Only Publication on the Future of Productivity
https://praxis.fortelabs.co/
Videos
Interviews and step by step breakdowns with Tiago Forte
Create Your Second Brain with Tiago Forte
It's Tiago Forte Week. Today, we chat with him about his digital organization concept the Second Brain. This is the way he's taught over 20,000 people about how to organize with tools like Evernote using concepts like PARA and CODE. A very interesting guide to organizing yourself!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5zhCd04a-4w
How to Use and Master Your Second Brain in 2019 - Tiago Forte - ProdCon
ProdCon is now over, but you can now begin to watch the talks!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N8fpvYZNRXI&t=20s
For GTD users
In Conversation with David Allen: Interview with Tiago Forte
A conversation between Tiago Forte, founder of productivity training firm Forte Labs, and David Allen, creator of the Getting Things Done method. Transcript, interview notes, and links here: https://medium.com/forte-labs/a-conversation-with-david-allen-on-quantifying-productivity-c6d97bc9ec38#.4rw5ip4l2
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DJl_w2AlGEI
The Definitive Guide To Digital Productivity | Tiago Forte | Modern Wisdom Podcast #074
Tiago Forte is a blogger, company owner and productivity coach. We all use digital tools, and some of us spend most of our lives at their mercy. Today we are going to learn the most effective process for having a productive digital life.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R0GuWDXLizU
More Building A Second Brain Videos
PARA in Notion
Using PARA to Organize Your Notion Workspace
You've probably heard me mention the PARA Method of organizing by Tiago Forte. I get asked about this a lot, so here is a tour of how I use PARA in my Notion workspace, and how to get started with this structure in your own space.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ebI3zExav2c
Playlist with use cases
Create Your Second Brain with Tiago Forte
It's Tiago Forte Week. Today, we chat with him about his digital organization concept the Second Brain. This is the way he's taught over 20,000 people about how to organize with tools like Evernote using concepts like PARA and CODE. A very interesting guide to organizing yourself!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5zhCd04a-4w&list=PLvs_n3uH2uUHMmSRFaCr7RPyteKxZHc1D
Creating A Capture Habit:
Smart Sync Workshop: David Perell + Tiago Forte
I'll show you how to automatically save your reading highlights from ebooks and online articles. I'm going to publish 200,000 words online this year. That's the equivalent of ~3 books, and I never write for more than 10 hours per week. This is my system for capturing ideas and turning them into writing.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lNJ33ImlZzs
The Roam Organization Model
Contrast with BASB
Interview with Conor White-Sullivan, Founder of Roam
This is a one-hour interview, discussion, demonstration, and debate between Conor White-Sullivan, founder of "note-taking tool for networked thought" Roam, and Tiago Forte, creator of the Building a Second Brain online course. More information at https://roamresearch.com and https://praxis.fortelabs.co
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Hw2kJF_kxjE&t=3205s
Implementing an Idea-Management System - LessWrong 2.0
This post is for you if: 1. Projects that excite you are growing to be a burden on your to-do list 2. You have a nagging sense that you're not making the most of the ideas you have every day 3.
https://www.lesswrong.com/posts/BHp82PvqCDayFpefg/implementing-an-idea-management-system
The Organized Mind
Inspires Tiago Forte, and gives compelling scientific arguments about organizing your mind and your surroundings
Book Summary of 'The Organized Mind: Thinking Straight in the Age of Information Overload'
In the best-selling The Organized Mind: Thinking Straight in the Age of Information Overload , neuroscientist Daniel Levitin argues that the problem with the proliferation of information isn't as much about the storage of the information as it is about organizing and retrieving that information.
https://www.rightattitudes.com/2017/05/09/the-organized-mind/
Daniel Levitin: "The Organized Mind: Thinking Straight in an Age of Information Overload"
he information age is drowning us with an unprecedented deluge of data. At the same time, we're expected to make more-and faster-decisions about our lives than ever before. No wonder, then, that the average American reports frequently losing car keys or reading glasses, missing appointments, and feeling worn out by the effort required just to keep up.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aR1TNEHRY-U
Advice I've Taken
Building A Second Brain - I organize my digital information and projects with PARA and follow Tiago Forte's digital note taking system.
posts.title: Knowledge Management: The Best Resources to Teach you How to Organize Your Mind
posts.desc: Featuring organization models from Tiago Forte's Building a Second Brain and an alternative research Model from Roamresearch
